attributes.action: Contraception to women with absent fathers
attributes.additional_details:
Many of the rioters, gangs and unemployed youths come from single mothers with absent fathers, relying on the state to take care of the offspring. Unless we take control of the cause from start point, we will never solve the problem.

Once the boys mature, there is no control, discipline or direction for their future. Apart from the easy route of crime.

One lad interviewed by Sky showed no remorse and reported it as a normal day. He was 16 providing for his baby. He drove the getaway van rammed full of stolen goods.
